quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: He who thinks great thoughts, often makes great errors.
quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

quotes.quote: One cannot step twice in the same river twice.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason but of imagination.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Liberty consists in doing what one desires.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: There is only one good, knowledge, and one evil, ignorance.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: This is patently absurd; but whoever wishes to become a philosopher must learn not to be frightened by absurdities.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Leisure is the mother of philosophy.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Philosophy is a battle against the bewitchment of our intelligence by means of language.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Science is what you know. Philosophy is what you don't know.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Philosophy is at once the most sublime and the most trivial of human pursuits.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: History is Philosophy teaching by examples.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Happiness is the highest good.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The greater the difficulty, the more glory in surmounting it.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: It is one thing to show a man that he is in error, and another to put him in possession of truth.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: I can control my passions and emotions if I can understand their nature.
quotes.author: Spinoza

quotes.quote: Virtue is nothing else than right reason.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Freedom is secured not by the fulfilling of one's desires, but by the removal of desire.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: In everything, there is a share of everything.
quotes.author: Anaxagoras

quotes.quote: The brave man is he who overcomes not only his enemies but his pleasures.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Good and evil, reward and punishment, are the only motives to a rational creature.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: You have passed through life without an opponent—no one can ever know what you are capable of, not even you.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Look back over the past, with its changing empires that rose and fell, and you can foresee the future too.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The one who puts the finishing touches on their life each day is never short of time.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Whatever can happen at any time can happen today.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: They lose the day in expectation of the night, and the night in fear of the dawn.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.  Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There is no better way to grow as a person than to do something you hate every day.
quotes.author: David Goggins

quotes.quote: Today I escaped anxiety. Or no, I discarded it, because it was within me, in my own perceptions — not outside.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
quotes.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Teach thy tongue to say, “I do not know,” and thous shalt progress.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: To love only what happens, what was destined. No greater harmony.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: But to recognize that if it’s humanly possible, you can do it too.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought — they must be earned.
quotes.author: Naval Ravikant

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Sometimes in life we must fight not only without fear, but also without hope.
quotes.author: Alessandro Pertini

quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: It can ruin your life only if it ruins your character. Otherwise, it cannot harm you — inside or out.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something readymade.  It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Entrust everything willingly to the gods, and then make your way through life—no one’s master and no one’s slave.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: You can’t fall if you don’t climb.  But there’s no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your perspective on life comes from the cage you were held captive in.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Life is very short and anxious for those who forget the past, neglect the present, and fear the future.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: In a little while you will have forgotten everything; in a little while everything will have forgotten you.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The tranquility that comes when you stop caring what they say. Or think, or do. Only what you do.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live to err is human, but to persist (in the mistake) is diabolical.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Be tolerant with others and strict with yourself.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: How does it help…to make troubles heavier by bemoaning them?
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If a man knows not which port he sails, no wind is favorable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Floods will rob us of one thing, fire of another. These are conditions of our existence which we cannot change.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Do what you will. Even if you tear yourself apart, most people will continue doing the same things.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He is most powerful who has power over himself.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Education costs money.  But then so does ignorance.
quotes.author: Sir Claus Moser

quotes.quote: No human thing is of serious importance.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Life, if well lived, is long enough.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: You can’t use up creativity.  The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It does not matter what you bear, but how you bear it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Just that you do the right thing. The rest doesn’t matter.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The great law of nature is that it never stops. There is no end.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: The whole future lies in uncertainty: live immediately.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Make the mind tougher by exposing it to adversity.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: What injures the hive injures the bee.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: To stop talking about what the good man is like, and just be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If it is not right, do not do it, if it is not true, do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: For it is better to die of hunger, but free from distress and fear, than to live in plenty with a troubled mind.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself?
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Progress is not achieved by luck or accident, but by working on yourself daily.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Remind yourself that what you love is mortal.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.
quotes.author: Epictetus
